Kup:

Kup aimed his blaster and opened fire against NightShift  he shouted =
trying to be convincent "YOU WIlL REGRET THAT!!!!"


From: Sandy 
Sent: Fri=
day, March 19, 2010 9:27 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Back t=
o the Ark


  
While lying on the ground, Tucson picks up Lord Elder's tran=
smission.

" I copy that, Lord Elder... I know just the thing too. By the w=
ay, I need you to activate a holographic field on me. As far as Hydras know=
s, Night Shift has mutilated me to the point of irecognizable proportions. =
I need a hologram of me in a dismantled state of being. That should also dr=
aw out who's hiding behind the cloaked field. Tucson out."

Night Shift hol=
ds onto the rear view mirror as he looks to Tucson.

" Psst, you're - not g=
onna hold a grudge against me for this are ya?"

Tucson shakes his head no.=


"Shhh... The less they know the better. So far you're doing great.. But w=
e are going to have another sparring match eventually, and when that happen=
s, you're going to lose."

Night Shift cringes.

"Slag, that means you're g=
onna lemme have it."

Tucson narrows his brow.

"Bet your rotten aft I am..=
 All right, now, concentrate on what's important. Right now you've beaten t=
he slag out of me, and you need to bring a trophy back to Hydras. But first=
....

He shoots an arrow into Night Shift's knee!

"AHHHHHH! WHAT THE PIT?!=
 SLAG YOU!"

"THAT'S FOR UNDERSETIMATING ME!"

Night Shift bears down hard =
on Tucson as Tucson now reveals that he has no Matrix inside him.

"You lyn=
' son of a glitch! Just wait till I get back ta Hydras! You're gonna tell m=
e where that Matrix is or else I'm gonna finish the job here'n now!"

Tucso=
n gives Night Shift a cold look.

" Go ahead, you'll never find it if you d=
o."

Without warning, a second arrow is shot into Night Shift's right thigh=
!

"AHHHH!!!"

Tucson acts the part and plays possum out on the field, just=
 as he has finished putting a few "Pointers" into Night Shift's intentions.=
 Night Shift limps away, still with the rear view mirror in hand.

"Slag, h=
e didn't have ta go that far.."

He limps with his right and left legs impa=
iled by arrows, also hindering him from transforming.

He was still not

t grey dot had reappeared again. He
> tried to examine it, but could get no=
 permanent fix on it. It jumped
> across the screen.
> 
> "What ever it is,=
 it's heavily cloaked." he said to himself. "Its only
> the senor enhanceme=
nts that allow us to get this much." Elder mumbled
> as he was thankful to =
the enhancement Legacy had installed. Still, it
> was only barely enough. T=
hey could only see the dot if it was moving
> quickly, when it slowed down =
it disappeared. He suspected that only
> because it was so close to the Ark=
 that he was able to detect it at
> all.
> 
> He opened a communication cha=
nnel to the Maximals, "When you guys are
> done, that sensor ghost is back,=
 I'm not sure if it ever actually
> left. It's still flying around the outs=
ide of the Ark."
